We the Britain tax payers demand that a full and proper investigation is launched into the rise and activities of Sharia Courts within the UK.

We demand that strict action is taken against the people that are running these courts if they are found to infringe UK law or if they are encouraging others to break our laws.

We demand that the government ensures that the is only one set of laws for everyone in the UK and that they are enforced by one Police force and one justice system.
